name: Splash Moist Towel Mens
description: Active males can take comfort in this mild and enchanting fragrance that also helps in keeping cool and refreshed all day or night. This is an antiseptic and hygienic face and hand wipe which will help you to be safe through cleanliness and hygiene. This is a Sri Lankan product that is manufactured to suite our tropical climatic conditions. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
